title: This is (probably) your next case - Lian Li @ Computex 2023
description: Thanks to Secretlab for sponsoring today's video! Check them out at   Computex is here and the first bit of tech we got to check out is Lian Li's upcoming case and AIO lineup! Alex took a look at what could be the future of PC cases and it looks like we're getting MORE screens and even MORE RGB. Will Alex be impressed or is the power going out a bad omen?  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Screens everywhere! 0:10 O11 Vision 1:52 O11 RGB 2:29 O11D EVO XL 3:36 Sponsor - Secretlab 4:00 SUP 01 5:51 DK07 7:31 Uni Fan TL LCD 9:36 Galahad Trinity Performance 10:37 Galahad 2 LCD 11:05 Outro
